Package com.cafean.CalcServer

Class LockHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.CalcServer.LockHandler
  • public class LockHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    An encapsulated handler for authentication tokens.

      • ALGO_NAME

        the encryption cipher algorithm name
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • BLOCK_SIZE

        public static final int BLOCK_SIZE
        the size of a token or token attempt array. This is the resulting size of all data blocks encrypted using this handler's encryption scheme.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • createRequest

        public static byte[] createRequest​(java.lang.String intfName,
                                   java.security.Key key,
                                   boolean local)
        Creates an appropriate request string from the given interface name and key.
        Parameters:
        intfName - a String containing the newly generated client interface name. This is the client-defined name that the server will use to name the requested interface. It is reccomended that this name be different for each client connection (e.g. By including the system time or a random number in the name. )
        key - the Key used by the server as it's public key.

      • createClientToken

        public static byte[] createClientToken​(java.security.Key key,
                                       byte[] serverToken,
                                       boolean local)
        Converts the server supplied token into an appropriate form to be returned to the server via a client request.
        Parameters:
        key - the Key object that contains the server's public key
        serverToken - a byte[] containing the token returned by the serveer

      • createAuthToken

        public int createAuthToken​(byte[] request,
                           byte[] token)
        Attempts to create an authorization token for use by the given request.
        Parameters:
        request - a byte[] encrypted with the server's public key that contains the name or identifier of the client requesting this token.
        token - a byte[] of length BLOCK_SIZE in which the token will be placed.
        Returns:
        0 for success; -1 for failed server lock configuration 1 for invalid request length; 2 for invalid key (in request);

      • checkAuthToken

        public boolean checkAuthToken​(byte[] request,
                              byte[] token)
        Checks the given token against the token last generated for the given request.

      • getRequestString

        public java.lang.String getRequestString​(byte[] request)
        Returns a String containing the decrypted contents of the given request

      • exportPublicKey

        public static void exportPublicKey​(java.io.File file)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Exports this lock handler's public key to the given file.
        Parameters:
        file - a File referring to the new key file location
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getPublicKey

        public static java.security.Key getPublicKey()
        retrieves the local calculation server's public key.

      • generateKeys

        public static void generateKeys()
        Generates a public/private pair of RSA encryption keys

      • modAuthData

        public static void modAuthData​(byte[] data)
        Modifies the bytes in the given byte[] in a way that can be reversed by a subsequent call to this method.
        Parameters:
        data - a byte[] containing the unencrypted data to be modified

      • getLocalAuthToken

        public static byte[] getLocalAuthToken()
        Returns an unencrypted auth token suitable for allowingonly local connections.
